Reference

Interacting with the B.C. Data Catalogue

Functions to search, browse, list, and explore records and their resources (datasets) in the B.C. Data Catalogue

bcdc_browse()

Load the B.C. Data Catalogue URL into an HTML browser

bcdc_search()

Search the B.C. Data Catalogue

bcdc_search_facets()

Get the valid values for a facet (that you can use in bcdc_search())

bcdc_list()

Return a full list of the names of B.C. Data Catalogue records

bcdc_get_record()

Show a single B.C. Data Catalogue record

Direct downloads of datasets

Directly dowload (or preview) datasets (resources) from the B.C. Data Catalogue

bcdc_get_data()

Download and read a resource from a B.C. Data Catalogue record

bcdc_preview()

Get map from the B.C. Web Service

bcdc_read_functions()

Formats supported and loading functions

Querying data from a Web Service catalogue record

Issue queries using select and filter verbs against datasets in the B.C. Data Catalogue that have Web Services.

bcdc_query_geodata()

Query data from the B.C. Web Service

bcdc_describe_feature()

Describe a Web Service feature

filter(<bcdc_promise>)

Filter a query from Web Service call

select(<bcdc_promise>)

Select columns from Web Service call

collect(<bcdc_promise>)

Force collection of Web Service request from B.C. Data Catalogue

EQUALS() DISJOINT() INTERSECTS() TOUCHES() CROSSES() WITHIN() CONTAINS() OVERLAPS() RELATE() BBOX() DWITHIN() BEYOND()

CQL Geometry Predicates

CQL()

CQL escaping

bcdc_options()

Retrieve options used in bcdata, their value if set and the default value.
